description:
Would you like to know how to get more visitors to you RapidWeaver Website? This course will show you how. With lectures on how to get a visitor to remember your name, how to find your backlink profile, and great money saving tips; you will learn what you need to succeed.

Get More Visitors for You RapidWeaver Website! Is designed with the busy website designer in mind. We don’t fool around with the same old “get Facebook & Twitter” dribble. Instead we tell you why Social Media is important (Spaced Repetition) and why it may not be right for everyone. But unlike most courses, that’s only a small part of what you will learn.

The course has over two hours of video and numerous bonuses, including PDF’s, two ZMOT booklets, and links to important websites. These videos are broken into short segments so you can locate important information easily.

You need this course if you know how to build a beautiful RapidWeaver website and are having trouble getting more than ten or twelve visitors a day. While this is not a course on how to use RapidWeaver, we will even show you which types of themes you need – and why.

Would you like to see the backlink profiles of all your competitors’ websites? This information will help you understand why some sites rank well and others fail. You will even learn how to quickly find the PageRank you every last website you visit.

If you are not familiar with some of these terms, don’t worry; every new concept is explained and you’ll understand why these ideas are so important. Nothing is held back.

Perhaps the best part of all: in only three hours from now you can finally take RapidWeaver’s advice and start Changing the world, one website at a time.


IMPORTANT NOTE: There are ten bonus PDFs along with the videos in the course. Look to the upper, right area of your window to see these downloadable materials. Among them, the very first lecture has a bonus PDF with all the links mentioned in the series.
title: Get More Visitors for Your RapidWeaver Website!
